title: How to Treat Your Hair with Natural Home Remedies

steps.title: Take one or two eggs depending on your hair volume and whip up the egg.
steps.content: Take one or two eggs depending on your hair volume and whip up the egg. Then apply it to your dry hair and cover your hair with a towel. Leave it for 15 minutes and then wash your hair normally.

steps.title: Try olive oil If you want shiny hair.
steps.content: Try olive oil If you want shiny hair. Warm up the olive oil for 15 seconds and apply it to your hair. You can wrap your hair with a towel and leave it for 20 minutes. After that, wash your hair normally.

steps.title: Take some coriander leaves to grind and boil it with water.
steps.content: Take some coriander leaves to grind and boil it with water. Let it cool down and use it to rinse your hair after you wash.

steps.title: Use aloe vera when your hair is dry and damaged.
steps.content: Use aloe vera when your hair is dry and damaged. Get a cup of aloe vera gel from the plant and add two teaspoons of castor oil and two teaspoons of basil powder. Mix it well and apply it to your hair and scalp. Cover your hair with a towel and go to sleep. In the morning, wash it with mild shampoo and clean water. If you try this once a week for many times, you will get healthy and beautiful hair. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Massage argan oil or coconut oil into your hair.
steps.content: Massage argan oil or coconut oil into your hair. Make sure to obtain natural, organic argan oil that has been cold pressed. This is an expensive elixir, but a little bit goes a long way and the oil will not turn rancid for a year or year and a half. Argan oil is non-greasy oil and incorporates easily. You can use it overnight as a leave-in. Put on a bit extra, wrap your head in a towel and awaken to more luxurious hair. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Use lime to control hair loss.
steps.content: Use lime to control hair loss. Take four tablespoons of coconut liquid and mix with lime. Apply this to your hair once a week. Use the white part of an egg and mix it with a lime. Then, apply it from the roots of the hair and wash it after one hour. In this way, you can lessen dandruff.

steps.title: Try to use mayonnaise for shiny and moisture hair.
steps.content: Try to use mayonnaise for shiny and moisture hair. When you hair is wet, use mayonnaise to apply the ends of your hair. Then use shower cap to cover your hair and wash it normally.

steps.title: Use papaya to treat for split ends.
steps.content: Use papaya to treat for split ends. Take some papaya depending on your hair volume and mix it with a cup of yogurt. Then, blend it well. After that, apply it on your hair and leave it for half an hour before you wash it with shampoo.

steps.title: When your hair is lessened in certain places, use banana liquid.
steps.content: When your hair is lessened in certain places, use banana liquid. Take banana liquid from the stem of the tree and take it just enough for one day. Then, apply it to certain places where your hair is lessened. If you try this for 10 days, you should get back hair in those places.

steps.title: Use neem oil to have black hair.
steps.content: Use neem oil to have black hair. Apply neem oil to your hair regularly then you will have smooth and black hair. After applying the oil, you can either massage your scalp well and keep it in overnight, or wash it after a few minutes.

steps.title: Rich in vitamin C, lemons can help you avoid hair damage and make the hair thicker.
steps.content: Rich in vitamin C, lemons can help you avoid hair damage and make the hair thicker. Lemons can also help you prevent hair graying. Slice a lemon in half and squeeze out the juice into a cup. Once extracted, massage your scalp with the lemon juice for 5 minutes and then let it dry. Wash your hair after 10 minutes.
